title: Lesson 45
paragraph: This lesson (Lesson 45) practices adjectives for basic descriptions — useful vocabulary for everyday observations.

words.example: The plant looks alive after we watered it.

words.meaning: very old; from a long time ago
words.example: They visited an ancient temple on the hill.

words.meaning: working by itself without human control
words.example: The doors open automatically when you approach.

words.meaning: forming an essential foundation; simple and fundamental
words.example: You should learn the basic grammar first.

words.meaning: empty or without any writing or marks
words.example: Please fill in the blank spaces on the form.

words.meaning: giving out or reflecting a lot of light; intelligent
words.example: The room is bright because of the large windows.
